GSP29nysvbh_u:617: sthāṇupurūṣayoḥ samānaṃ dharmamārohapariṇāhau paśyan pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoviśeṣaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ kisvidityanyataraṃ nāvadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:619: samānamanayordharmamupalabhe viśeṣamanyatarasya nopalabha ityeṣā buddhiḥ apekṣā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:628: tasmin dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti sandehaḥ, viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:629: kiṃ dravyasya sato guṇakamabhyo viśeṣaḥ, āhosvidaguṇasya sato dravyakarmabhyaḥ, atha
GSP29nysvbh_u:631: viśeṣāpekṣā anyatamasya vyavasthāpakaṃ dharmaṃ nopalabha iti buddhiriti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:641: ataḥ kkacidupasabhyamāne tattvavyavasthāpakasya pramāṇasyānupalabdheḥ kiṃ sadupalabhyate 'thāsaditi saṃśayo bhavati//
GSP29nysvbh_u:662: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:663: lokasāmānyamanatītāḥ laukikāḥ, naisargikaṃ vainayikaṃ buddhyatiśayam aprāptāḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:665: yathā yamarthaṃ laukikā budhyatante, tathā parīkṣakā api, so 'rtho dṛṣṭāntaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:699: niratiśayāścetanāḥ dehendriyamanaḥsaṃ viṣayeṣu tattatkāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣa iti sāṅkhcānām /
GSP29nysvbh_u:708: na tairvinā so 'rthaḥ sidhyati te 'rthā yadadhiṣṭhānāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:722: yatra kiṃcidarthajātamaparīkṣitamabhyupagamyate, astu dravyaṃ śabdaḥ, sa tu nityo 'thānitya iti?
GSP29nysvbh_u:723: dravyasya sato anityatā nityatā vā tadviśeṣaḥ parīkṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:724: so 'bhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ svabuddhyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā parabuddhyavajñānāya ca pravartata iti //31//
GSP29nysvbh_u:729: daśāvayavāneke nauyayikā vākye sañcakṣate jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ prayojanaṃ saṃśayavyudāsa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:730: te kasmānnocyanta iti? tatrāpratīyamāne 'rthe pratyayārthasya pravartikā jijñāsā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:731: apratīyamānamarthaṃ kasmājjijñāsate? taṃ tattvato jñātaṃ hāsyāmi vopādāsya upekṣiṣye veti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:738: sā śakyaprāptirna sādhakasya vākyasya bhāgena yujyate pratijñādivaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:739: prayojanaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇamarthasādhakasya vākyasya phalaṃ naikadeśa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:743: tattvārnthasādhakabhāvāttu pratijñādayaḥ sādhakavāṅkyasya bhāgā ekadeśā avayavā iti // 32 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:748: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñā sādhyanirdeśaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:753: udāharaṇena sāmānyātsādhyasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ hetuḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:754: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmamudāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhanatāvacanaṃ hetuḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:772: sādhyaṃ ca dvividham dharmiviśiṣṭo vā dharmaḥ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:773: dharmaviśiṣṭo vā dharmī anityaḥ śabda iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:778: sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ taddharmabhāvī|
GSP29nysvbh_u:779: yasmin dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādharmyādutpattidharmakatvāt sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ bhavati sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:783: tacca bhūtvā na bhavati, ātmānaṃ jahāti nirudhyata ityanityam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:785: so 'yamekasmin dvayordharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sādharmyād vyasthita upalabhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:786: taṃ dṛṣṭānta upalabhamānaḥ śabde 'pyanuminoti, śabdo 'pyutpattidharmakatvādanityaḥ sthālyādivaditi|
GSP29nysvbh_u:794: so 'yamātmādirdṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavaidharmyādanutpattidharmakatvādataddharmabhāvī-yo 'sau sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ sa tasmin na bhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:795: atrātmādau dṛṣṭānta utpattidharmakatvasyābhāvādanityatvaṃ na bhavatīti upalabhamānaḥ śabde vapiryayamanuminoti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:797: sādharmyoktasya hetoḥ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:799: pūrvasmin dṛṣṭānte yau tau dharmauṃ sādhyasādhanabhūtau paśyati sādhye 'pi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamanuminoti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:800: uttarasmin dṛṣṭānte yayordharmayorekasyābhāvāditarasyābhāvaṃ paśyati tayorekatarasya bhāvāditarasya bhāvaṃ sādhye 'numinotīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:802: tadidaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyamiti //37//
GSP29nysvbh_u:805: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:809: tathā ca śabda utpattidharmaka iti sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvamūpasaṃhriyate |
GSP29nysvbh_u:819: sādharmyokte vā vaidharmyokte vā yathodāharaṇamupasaṃhriyate tasmādutpattidharmakatvādanityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:822: tatra sādharmyokte tāvadvetau vākyam, anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:846: kasya cāpadeśātpratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ syāt iti?
GSP29nysvbh_u:847: asatyudāharaṇe kena sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasādhanamupādīyeta?
GSP29nysvbh_u:849: upanayaṃ cāntareṇa sādhye 'nupasaṃhṛtaḥ sādhako dharmo nārthaṃ sādhayet|
GSP29nysvbh_u:850: nigamanābhāve cānabhivyaktasaṃbandhānāṃ pratijñādīnāmekārthena pravartanaṃ tatheti pratipādanaṃ kasyeti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:853: udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya sādhakabhāvavacanaṃ hetvarthaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:857: na caitasyāṃ hetūdāharaṇapariśuddhau satyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpājjātinigrahasthānabahutvaṃ prakramate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:858: avyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamudāharaṇe jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:859: vyavasthiteha khilu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve dṛṣṭāntasthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya hetutvena upādānaṃ na sādharmyamātrasya,
GSP29nysvbh_u:863: ata ūrdhvaṃ tarko lakṣaṇīya iti athedamucyate---
GSP29nysvbh_u:866: atha jijñāsitasya vastuno vyāhatau dharmauṃ vibhāgena vimṛśati, kiṃ svit ittthamāhosvinnetthamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:870: tatra nidarśanam, yo 'yaṃ jñātā jñātavyamarthaṃ jānīte, taṃ tattvato jānīyeti jijñāsā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:873: yadyayamanutpattidharmakaḥ tataḥ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalamanubhavati jñātā|
GSP29nysvbh_u:875: uttarottarāpāye ca tadanantarābhāvādapavarga iti syātāṃ saṃsārāpavargauṃ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:877: utpannaḥ khalu jñātā dehendriyaviṣayabuddhivedanābhiḥ saṃbadhyata iti nāsyedaṃ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:879: tasyāvidyamānasya niruddhasya vā svakṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalopabhogo nāsti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:883: kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tattvajñānameveti? anavadhāraṇāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:885: na tvavadhārayati na vyavasyati na niścinoti evamevedamiti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:887: tattvajñānaviṣayābhyanujñālakṣaṇādūhād bhāvitātprasannādanantaraṃ pramāṇasāmarthyāt tattvajñānam utpadyata ityevaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:888: so 'yaṃ tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇābhyanujñānāt pramāṇasahito vāde 'padiṣṭa iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:889: avijñātatattve 'rthe iti yathā so 'rtho bhavati tasya tathābhāvastattvamaviparyayo yāthātathyam //40//
GSP29nysvbh_u:895: tau sādhanopālambhau pakṣapratipakṣāśrayau vyatiṣaktāvanubandhena pravarttamānau pakṣapratipakṣāvityucyete|
GSP29nysvbh_u:898: nedaṃ pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti eko hi pratijñātamarthaṃ taṃ hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddhaṃ coddharati dvitīyasya|
GSP29nysvbh_u:904: tāvetau sambhavāsambhavau vimarśaṃ saha nivarttayata ubhayasambhave|
GSP29nysvbh_u:907: so 'yaṃ vimarśaḥ pakṣapratipakṣāvavadyotya nyāyaṃ pravartayatītyupādīyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:909: yatra tu dharmisāmānyagatau viruddhau dharmauṃ hetutaḥ sambhavataḥ tatra samuccayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:911: yathā kriyāvad dravyamiti lakṣaṇavacane yasya dravyasya kriyāyogo hetutaḥ saṃbhavati tat kriyāvat,
GSP29nysvbh_u:916: na cāyaṃ nirṇaye niyamaḥ vimṛśyaiva pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti, kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh_u:923: tisraḥ kathā bhavanti, vādo jalpo vitaṇḍā ceti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:928: ekādhikaraṇasthau viruddhau dharmauṃ pakṣapratipakṣau pratyanīkabhāvāt, astyātmā nāstyātmeti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:929: nānādhikaraṇasthau viruddhāvapi na pakṣapratipakṣau, yathā nitya ātmā, anityā buddhiriti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:937: tau sādhanopālambhau ubhayorapi pakṣayorvyatiṣaktāvanubaddhau ca tāvad yāvadeko nivṛtta ekataro vyavasthita iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:940: tatpratiṣedhe ca kasyacidabhyanujñānārthaṃ siddhāntāviruddha iti vacanam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:941: siddhāntamabhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddha iti viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasyābhyanujñā vāde|
GSP29nysvbh_u:942: pañcāvayavopapanna iti hīnamanyatamenāpyavayavena nyūnam hetudāharaṇādhikamadhikam iti caitayorabhyanujñānārthamiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:944: anyathobhāvapi pakṣau sthāpanāhetunā pravṛttau vāda iti syāt|
GSP29nysvbh_u:946: tenāpi kalpena sādhanopālambhau vāde bhavata iti jñāpayati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:947: chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambho jalpa iti vacanādvinigraho jalpa iti mā vijñāyi,
GSP29nysvbh_u:949: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambho vāda eveti sa mā vijñāyītyevamartha pṛthak pramāṇatarkagrahaṇamiti //1//
GSP29nysvbh_u:956: chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanamupālambhaścāsmin kriyata iti evaṃviśeṣaṇo jalpaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh_u:957: na khalu vai chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanaṃ kasyacidarthasya sambhavati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:958: pratiṣedhārthataivaiṣāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe viśeṣalakṣaṇe ca śrūyate vacanavighāto 'rthavikalpopattyā chalam iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:967: tāni hi prayujyamānāni parapakṣavighāte svapakṣaṃ rakṣanti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:968: tathā coktaṃ tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jalpavitaṇḍe bījaprarohasaṃharakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇavat iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:969: yaścāsau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasyopālambhastasya caitāni prayujyamānāni pratiṣedhabighātātsahakārīṇi bhavanti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:970: tadevamaṅgībhūtānāṃ chalādīnāmupādānaṃ jalpe, na svatantraṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ|
GSP29nysvbh_u:977: yau tau samānādhikaraṇau viruddhau dharmauṃ pakṣapratipakṣāvityuktau tayorekataraṃ vaitaṇḍiko na sthāpayatīti parapakṣapratiṣedhenaiva pravarttata iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:979: yadvai khalu tatparapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:980: na tvasau sādhyaṃ kaṃcidarthaṃ pratijñāya sthāpayatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:998: dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvamanityatvaṃ ca dharmauṃ na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1000: ātmādau ca dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇasādharmyātsādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ iti asparśatvāditi heturnityatvaṃ vyabhicarati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1002: evaṃ dvividhāpi dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārātsādhyasādhanabhāvo nāstīti lakṣaṇābhāvādaheturiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1005: ekasminnante vidyata iti aikāntiko viparyayādanaikānitakaḥ, ubhāyāntavyāpakatvāditi // 5//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1009: taṃ viruṇaddhīti tadvirodhī, abhyupetaṃ siddhāntaṃ vyāhantīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1010: yathā so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakterapaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt, na nityo vikāra upapadyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1012: so 'yaṃ nityatvapratiṣedhāditi heturvyakterapeto 'pi vikāro 'stītyanena svasiddhāntena virudhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1020: astitvaṃ cātmalābhāpracyutiriti ca viruddhāvetau dhamau na saha sambhavata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1021: so 'yaṃ heturyaṃ siddhāntamāśritya pravarttate tameva vyāhantīti // 6//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1024: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā saḥ nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1027: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇamanativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1029: yantra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate, sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1030: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiśca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1031: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyate evamanityadharmaḥ api|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1034: yadi nityadharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta, na syātprakaraṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1035: yadi vā anityadharmo gṛhyeta, evamapi nivartteta prakaraṇam|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1036: so 'yaṃ heturubhau pakṣau pravartayannanyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate // 7//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1043: sādhyaṃ tāvadetat---kiṃ puruṣavacchāyāpi gacchati āho svidāvarakadravye saṃsarpati āvaraṇasantānādasannidhisantāno 'yaṃ tejaso gṛhyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1044: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yastejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhirevāvicchinno gṛhyata iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1049: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ityucyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1051: prāgūrddhaṃ ca vyakteravasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1055: vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktiratyeti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1056: sati pradīpasaṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati, na nivṛtte saṃyoge rūpaṃ gṛhyate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1057: nivṛtte tu dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1066: ityetadvacanādviparyāsenokto heturudāharaṇasādharmyāttathā vaidharmyātsādhyasādhanaṃ hetulakṣaṇa na jahāti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1074: na sāmānyalakṣaṇe chalaṃ śakyamudāhartum, vibhāge tūdāharaṇāni // 10 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1078: NyS_1,2.11: tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalamupacāracchalaṃ ca //
GSP29nysvbh_u:1086: tatrāyaṃ chalavādī vaktuḥ abhiprāyādavivakṣitamanyamarthaṃ nava kambalā asyeti tāvadabhihitaṃ bhavateti kalpayati|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1087: kalpayitvā cāsambhavena pratiṣedhati, eko 'sya kambalaḥ kuto nava kambalā iti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1088: tadidaṃ sāmānyaśabde vāci nimitte chalaṃ vākchalamiti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:1090: navakambala ityanekārthābhidhānam, navaḥ kambalo 'syeti, nava kambalā asyeti ca|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1091: etasminprayukte yeyaṃ kalpanā navakambalā asyetyetad bhavatābhihitam, tacca na sambhavatīti|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1096: asyābhidhānasyāyamartho 'bhidhena iti samānaḥ sāmānyaśabdasya, viśeṣo viśiṣṭaśabdasya|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1104: sāmarthyāt yatrārthakriyādeśanā sambhavati tatra pravartante nārthasāmānye,
GSP29nysvbh_u:1106: evamayaṃ sāmānyaśabdo navakambala iti yo 'rthaḥ sambhavati navaḥ kambalo 'syeti, tatra pravartate|
GSP29nysvbh_u:1107: yasatu na sambhavati nava kambalā asyeti, tatra na pravartate|
